mstList.title: Union
mstList.description: A union is a community of players. If you belong to a union, you can join in on union missions.

mstList.title: Union
mstList.description: You can join a union by searching for one or by creating a new one. Up to 10 players can join a union.

mstList.title: Union
mstList.description: Union missions are missions that all members take on together. Missions are reset each week on a specific day and time. Once you join a union, there is a minimum wait period before you can contribute to missions.

mstList.title: Union
mstList.description: Battle content for all union members to play is scheduled to come! Please wait for announcements coming soon!

mstList.title: Ascension
mstList.description: When you acquire a Kioku already in your possession, the additional copies will be used for ascension. Each ascension increases the Kioku's Special Attack Lvl.

mstList.title: Ascension
mstList.description: Duplicate copies of a Portrait can be consumed to perform ascension. Ascending a Portrait will improve the effects of the Portrait's skill.

mstList.title: Puella Pictura Rank
mstList.description: Rank will increase based on the number of Memsparks collected. There are benefits for each rank achieved, such as items, boosts to bonuses provided by Support Kioku, and unlocking of higher rank upgrade quests.

mstList.title: The Chamber of Light
mstList.description: In the Chamber of Light, you can view Puella Pictura and other collectibles (Gallery, Stories, Music) unlocked from obtaining Kioku and Memsparks.

mstList.title: Rewards for Viewing Chamber of Light Collectibles
mstList.description: When viewing collectibles in the Chamber of Light for the first time you can earn Magica Stones.

mstList.title: Event Quests
mstList.description: "Steady Steps Forward: Magical Girl Dreams" will be a permanent event. Limited-time events will also be released going forward. We hope you enjoy the upcoming event quests!

mstList.title: Event Quests
mstList.description: In event quests, you can take on battles a set number of times each day. Play a little each day to make your way through events.

mstList.title: Event Quests
mstList.description: In event quests, you can earn medals as battle rewards. Collect medals and trade them for Portraits and a variety of other items.

mstList.title: Event Quests
mstList.description: You can access the event trader from the banner on the top page of an event. Trade the medals you've collected for items such as Portraits and upgrade materials to help you progress through the game.

mstList.title: Player Match
mstList.description: Victory is the goal as you battle against other players! You'll compete for rankings during the event period based on points earned. New seasons begin at set intervals.

mstList.title: Player Match
mstList.description: In Player Match, all battles proceed in Full Auto mode. Additionally, a break gauge is added for the Magical Girls in your party. The break gauge amount varies according to the Kioku's rarity and role.

mstList.title: Player Match
mstList.description: You can increase points earned from battles through different bonus conditions, such as defeating stronger opponents or having a win-streak. Aim to win by racking up points through these bonuses!

mstList.title: Player Match
mstList.description: You can earn rewards based on your ranking and points earned. Match Medals earned from point rewards can be exchanged for various rewards at the trader.

mstList.title: Player Match
mstList.description: You can play for free up to 5 times each day. You can also spend Magica Stones for additional plays. So be sure to play every day and shoot for grand rewards!

mstList.title: Upgrade Quests: Kioku Upgrade
mstList.description:
In these quests, you can earn materials to upgrade your Kioku.
Higher-difficulty quests yield higher-tier materials.

mstList.title: Upgrade Quests: Magic Unlock
mstList.description: In these quests, you can earn materials to upgrade your Kioku's Magic Lvl. Higher-difficulty quests yield higher-tier materials.

mstList.title: Kioku Lvl. Upgrade
mstList.description: Raising the Lvl. of a Kioku will increase its stats. Kioku Lvl. can be raised by consuming special materials.

mstList.title: Kioku Lvl. Upgrade
mstList.description:
Each Kioku has a level cap.
It will increase further each time you raise your Player Lvl.

mstList.title: Portrait Enhancement
mstList.description: This feature lets you enhance portraits. Raising their enhancement level will increase the effects of abilities.

mstList.title: Portrait Enhancement
mstList.description: You can get the materials you need for raising portrait enhancement levels from event and Player Match rewards.

mstList.title: Story Event
mstList.description: Event missions also offer fabulous rewards for clearing high-difficulty quests.

mstList.title: Story Event
mstList.description: Story events will become locked once their initial availability period ends. All events, including those that are locked, can be replayed later. You can unlock them by using special items.

mstList.title: Magic Unlock Material Quest
mstList.description: You can now play quests that grant Magic Unlock materials. Clear battles to get the materials you need to upgrade the Magic Lvl. of your Kioku.

mstList.title: Magic Unlock Material Quest
mstList.description: You can earn more Magic Unlock materials by clearing higher rank quests. Quests of a certain rank or higher grant higher-grade Magic Unlock materials.

mstList.title: Magic Unlock Material Quest
mstList.description: You can increase your quest rank by raising your Puella Pictura to a certain rank.

mstList.title: Heartphials
mstList.description: Raising a Magical Girl's Heartphial Lvl. grants a variety of bonuses, such as boosts to Kioku stats and access to Magical Girl Stories, unique Portraits, voice content, and more. Each magical girl has one Heartphial.

mstList.title: Heartphials
mstList.description: To raise Heartphial Lvl., you will need to use special materials. Materials can be obtained through Main Quests, Events, and other means.

mstList.title: Heartphials
mstList.description: Portraits obtained from Heartphials have useful abilities that activate when equipped to a Magical Girl's Kioku. So be sure to raise the Heartphial Lvl. to obtain portraits!

mstList.title: Score Attack
mstList.description: Score Attack is a feature where you defeat powerful enemies to earn scores based on the battle results. Depending on your score, you can earn high score and total score rewards.

mstList.title: Score Attack
mstList.description: High score rewards are obtained based on the maximum score you earn during the Score Attack event. The higher the difficulty, the higher the score you can earn, and fulfilling certain conditions like clearing a battle quickly or minimizing damage taken will grant you an even higher score.

mstList.title: Score Attack
mstList.description: Total score rewards are obtained based on the total value of scores earned during the Score Attack event. You don't need to earn a high score in a single battle, so you can clear battles repeatedly to boost your total.

mstList.title: Heartphial Quests
mstList.description: Clear Heartphial quest battles to earn Heartphial EXP for the Magical Girls assigned as Main Kioku to your party. So form a team with the Magical Girls you want to earn EXP with and take them into battle!

mstList.title: Heartphial Quests
mstList.description:
These quests can be played a limited number of times per day.
Play consistently to keep raising Heartphial levels!

mstList.title: Heartphial Quests
mstList.description: Battles can be skipped once they've been cleared. Only parties that have cleared the battle can be used to skip.

mstList.title: Puella Pictura Progress
mstList.description: If you collect all the Memsparks ("Story" or "Other") within a Labyrinth, a piece of a Puella Pictura will be filled in.

mstList.title: Puella Pictura Progress
mstList.description: Tap the picture frame to check which Window Into Memory contains its pieces.

mstList.title: Battler Mode
mstList.description:
This content is more difficult than standard mode.
Play in battler mode to gain the Memsparks you need to raise your Puella Pictura rank.
You'll earn a reward of Magica Stone x1,000 for completing a Puella Pictura.

mstList.title: Battler Mode
mstList.description: In battler mode, you can get Witch-themed 5★ Portraits. You can also raise your player level by clearing each battle to gain player EXP. Raising your player level also lets you boost the level cap of Kioku, so be sure to take on this challenge.

mstList.title: Chat
mstList.description: The chat feature allows players to communicate with each other. Union chat, group chat, direct messages, and a blocklist are available for you to use.

mstList.title: Chat
mstList.description: Union chat allows you to chat with fellow members of the same union. You must belong to a union to use this feature.

mstList.title: Chat
mstList.description: Group chat allows you to chat with other players who've joined that group. You can create a new chat, or join up to 100 group chats you've been invited to. One group can have up to 15 players max.

mstList.title: Chat
mstList.description: Direct messages allow you to chat with any player. You can be a part of up to 100 different direct messages.

mstList.title: Special Attack Upgrade
mstList.description: This feature lets you upgrade the Special Attack Lvl. of a Kioku. Increasing the Lvl. will make special attacks more powerful.

mstList.title: Special Attack Upgrade
mstList.description: You can raise the Special Attack Lvl. cap by ascending a Kioku to certain stages. The materials for upgrading special attacks can be obtained as rewards from events and at the Match Medal Trader.

mstList.title: Unlocking Magic
mstList.description: Unlocking magic lets you power up your Kioku. It can provide a significant boost to stats and skill effects, so be sure to unlock magic when you can.

mstList.title: Unlocking Magic
mstList.description: Special materials are required to unlock magic. You can get these materials from Magic Unlock Material Quests in the Upgrade Quests section, and as event rewards.

mstList.title: Setting Auto Modes for Battle
mstList.description: You can set the battle to proceed on Auto mode. There's Semi Auto mode, in which actions other than special attacks are performed automatically, and there's Full Auto mode, in which all actions are performed automatically.

mstList.title: Profile
mstList.description: On the Profile screen, you can set your name, a greeting, your favorite Kioku, and a title you earned.

mstList.title: Profile
mstList.description: Titles can be earned from specific missions, event rewards, etc.

mstList.title: Support Kioku
mstList.description: Equipping a Support Kioku boosts stats and can activate support abilities.

mstList.title: Support Kioku
mstList.description: A Support Kioku's "Stats Applied" percentage can be increased by raising your Puella Pictura rank.

mstList.title: Support Kioku
mstList.description: Support Abilities have activation conditions, so check that the main Kioku meets those conditions when equipped. Additionally, their effects can be upgraded depending on Magic Lvl.

mstList.title: Nightmare Mode
mstList.description: This high-difficulty content unlocks original stories to read and offers 5★ portrait rewards. So power-up your party to play!

mstList.title: Nightmare Mode Addition
mstList.description: For all Labyrinths playable in Standard mode, there is an additional Nightmare mode. Labyrinths to be added in future updates will also feature Standard and Nightmare modes.

mstList.title: Labyrinth Map (Points)
mstList.description:
There are several types of points within a Labyrinth.
Battle Points: Only battles are encountered here.
Exploration Points: You'll take on a Kioku's form to explore within.
Flashback Points: You'll fully engage with a memory.

mstList.title: Labyrinth Map (Memsparks)
mstList.description: You can check a list of Memsparks that can be obtained in the current Window Into Memory. Any Memsparks (Story) you obtain can be selected from the list to read immediately.

mstList.title: Labyrinth Map (Memsparks)
mstList.description: Collecting Memsparks fills in Puella Pictura pieces, which raises Puella Pictura rank.

mstList.title: Labyrinth Map (Memsparks)
mstList.description:
Upon completing a Puella Pictura, you'll get the following rewards.
- Magica Stone x1,000
- A fully ascended portrait
And in some cases, you can also get 5★ Kioku "[Lux☆Magica] Madoka Kaname."

mstList.title: Kioku Level & Player Level
mstList.description:
Each Kioku has a level, and their level
cap is the same as your player level. Player level is mainly increased through playing various quests.

mstList.title: Kioku Level & Player Level
mstList.description: You can obtain Kioku EXP by battling or using exclusive items.

mstList.title: Portrait Ascension
mstList.description: When obtaining a duplicate of a portrait you already have, that portrait will be automatically ascended. There are 5 stages of ascension, and ascending portraits increases portrait stats.

mstList.title: Boss Points
mstList.description: A powerful boss awaits you at the end of your Labyrinth exploration. Auto mode cannot be used during Boss Point battles.

mstList.title: Boss Points
mstList.description: Once the boss is defeated, the Labyrinth will be cleared and you'll get Magica Stone x300.

mstList.title: Area Boss Points
mstList.description: Area Boss Points will appear as you explore a Labyrinth. Enemies within Area Boss Points are more powerful than those you've faced. Auto mode cannot be used during these battles.

mstList.title: Extra Points
mstList.description: When you clear a point, multiple points may be added to the map. These Extra Points are not directly related to the story's progress, but you can obtain items and Memsparks there.

mstList.title: Extra Points
mstList.description: If items remain within the point, the area around the point will sparkle. So use it as a visual guide when exploring a Labyrinth.

mstList.title: Portrait Effects
mstList.description: Each portrait has unique abilities. By equipping portraits that complement Kioku characteristics, you'll give your party an edge in battle.

mstList.title: Strategy Hints
mstList.description: You can clear Labyrinths by defeating bosses. Boss battles are more difficult than regular ones, so it's best to take them on after building up your Kioku.

mstList.title: Strategy Hints
mstList.description: From the menu, go to Party > Training > Kioku List and select a Kioku. Tap the + button on the details screen to open the Kioku Upgrade screen. You can get the materials you need for upgrades from Kioku Upgrade Quests in the Upgrade Quests section.

mstList.title: Strategy Hints
mstList.description:
If an enemy seems too tough, keep the following points in mind.
1) Use the break system to your advantage.
2) Try forming a party with roles in mind.
3) Use the unit details to check enemy info.

mstList.title: Battle Systems
mstList.description: In general, all battles follow the same basic flow: put the enemy in break, raise the break bonus to multiply damage dealt, then unleash powerful special attacks to deal maximum damage.

mstList.title: Roles
mstList.description: There are 6 unique roles in battle. Try to form parties that take advantage of each role's unique features.

mstList.title: Checking Enemy Info
mstList.description: You can check the enemy's skills and active effects during battle. Use this when you'd like to know more details.

mstList.title: Break
mstList.description: Depleting an enemy's break gauge will cause it to enter Break status. With enemies in break, it is easy to turn the battle to your advantage. Increase an enemy's break bonus to deal damage more efficiently.

mstList.title: Roles
mstList.description:
Each Magical Girl has a role that represents her particular battle style.
Madoka Kaname is a Breaker, skilled at depleting the enemy's break gauge and generating break bonus.
Homura Akemi is an Attacker, skilled at dealing large amounts of DMG.

mstList.title: Buffers
mstList.description: As a Buffer, Tsuruno Yui is adept at supporting allies and raising firepower with a variety of buff effects.

mstList.title: Defenders
mstList.description: As a Defender, Sana Futaba can boost endurance and is adept at protecting allies.

mstList.title: Debuffers
mstList.description: As a Debuffer, Felicia Mitsuki is adept at turning the tides of battle by applying debuffs and ailments to enemies.

mstList.title: Battle Systems
mstList.description: In general, all battles follow the same basic flow: put the enemy in break, raise the break bonus to multiply damage dealt, then unleash powerful special attacks to deal maximum damage.

mstList.title: Roles
mstList.description: There are 6 unique roles in battle.

mstList.title: ATTACKER
mstList.description: Has high firepower and specializes in dealing damage to enemies.

mstList.title: BREAKER
mstList.description: Breakers excel at depleting the break gauge and increasing the break bonus.

mstList.title: BUFFER
mstList.description: Adept at supporting allies and raising firepower with a variety of buff effects.

mstList.title: DEBUFFER
mstList.description: Adept at turning the tides of battle by applying debuffs and ailments to enemies.

mstList.title: DEFENDER
mstList.description: Adept at protecting allies, capable of shielding allies from attacks and boosting endurance.

mstList.title: HEALER
mstList.description: Adept at aiding allies with a variety of restoration skills.

mstList.title: Exploration Points： Movement
mstList.description: At exploration points, you will automatically explore inside the Witch's Labyrinth.

mstList.title: Exploration Points: Items
mstList.description:
You may sometimes find items inside exploration points. You can pick them up automatically by moving your Magical Girl.
* If you Return or are unable to reach the goal point, these items will be lost.

mstList.title: Exploration Points： Memsparks
mstList.description:
Memsparks can be found inside Exploration Points. You can pick them up automatically by moving your Magical Girl.
* If you return or are unable to reach the goal point, Memsparks will not be claimed.

mstList.title: Exploration Points: Manual Mode
mstList.description: If you'd like to explore manually, you can take control of the Magical Girl at any time by tapping the "Manual" mode button.

mstList.title: Exploration Points ：Branching Paths
mstList.description:
Inside exploration points, paths will sometimes diverge.
Tap the arrow or flick the screen in the direction you want to move.
Side paths may hide items as well as enemies.

mstList.title: Exploration Points: Battles
mstList.description: You may encounter enemies inside exploration points. Making contact with the enemy symbol will begin the battle.

mstList.title: Exploration Points: Memsparks (Other) - Portraits
mstList.description: Memsparks (Other) may contain Portraits.

mstList.title: Exploration Points: Memsparks (Other) - Music
mstList.description: Memsparks (Other) may contain Music, as well as information on Witches, Minions, and Labyrinths.

mstList.title: Hidden Items
mstList.description: In addition to items you can pick up along the way, you might also spot shiny objects on the ground while exploring. You can get an item by tapping them, so be sure to look around!

mstList.title: Switches
mstList.description: While exploring, you may find dropped switches along the way. Obtaining a switch will add new points on the Labyrinth map.

mstList.title: Bonus Points
mstList.description:
Bonus Points may sometimes appear as you explore a Labyrinth.
There are no encounters there, but you can obtain items and Memsparks.
So be sure to check each one you find!

mstList.title: Assign
mstList.description: A party can consist of up to 5 Kioku. 1 Portrait per Kioku can also be equipped.

mstList.title: Party: Kioku
mstList.description:
Select the Kioku you'd like to assign.
You can change the slot to assign using the icons below.

mstList.title: Party: Portraits
mstList.description:
Select the Portrait you'd like to equip.
Portraits cannot be equipped without first assigning a Main Kioku.
You can switch equip slots using the Kioku icons at the bottom of the screen.

mstList.title: Party: Auto Party
mstList.description: Let's try using Auto Party.

mstList.title: Trader
mstList.description:
At the trader, you can trade points earned from Fate Weaves for Kioku, exchange event medals for various items, and more!
Some trade items are only available for a limited time, so be sure to check regularly.

mstList.title: Magia Box
mstList.description: A-Q Chips, upgrade materials, and other items will accumulate over time (24 hrs max). You will be able to generate and collect more rewards as your Player Lvl. increases.

mstList.title: Magia Box
mstList.description: Up to 7 times a day, you can use Magica Stones to collect 6 hours' worth of rewards at once. For the first collection each day, you do not need to spend Magica Stones.
